description: This file defines a `Board` class representing a chessboard with minimal FEN support for piece placement, active color, and castling rights. It includes methods for loading a position from FEN, exporting to FEN, initializing the starting position, and tracking move states and castling rights.

classes.name: Board
classes.description: Represents a chessboard with minimal FEN support, including functions to parse and generate FEN strings, initialize standard setup, and track game state flags related to castling and piece movements.

methods.name: loadFEN
methods.description: Initializes the `Board` object from a FEN string, parsing piece placement, active color, halfmove clock, and fullmove number. Also infers castling rights based on starting positions.

methods.name: toFEN
methods.description: Generates a FEN string representing the current position of the `Board`, including piece placement, active color, castling rights, en passant (not tracked in MVP), halfmove clock, and move number.

methods.name: initStartingPosition
methods.description: Resets the board to the standard chess starting position using a predefined FEN string.

methods.name: getPiece
methods.description: Returns the `Piece` object at the specified rank and file.

methods.name: setPiece
methods.description: Sets a `Piece` at the specified rank and file.

methods.name: getSideToMove
methods.description: Returns which side (white or black) is to move next.

methods.name: setSideToMove
methods.description: Sets which side (white or black) is to move next.

methods.name: noteKingOrRookMove
methods.description: Updates castling rights flags based on a moved piece's original position and type.

methods.name: incrementMove
methods.description: Updates move counters after a move is made, including reset of the halfmove clock if capture or pawn move occurred, and incrementing fullmove number for black's turn.
